forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 37. South wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 20. West wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
On this afternoon in Boston, the skies are draped in a gentle, muted veil; a soft sun peeks through, casting a pale light that warms the chill in the air. Though the temperature hovers near the cool end of the spectrum, the south breeze carries with it a comforting promise of crisp clarity. As the day drifts toward evening, clouds will deepen into a partial cover, ushering in a night that cools down to the low twenties, accentuated by a light westward wind. This transition invites a cozy ambiance, where warmth becomes a priority.

As you step out, a layer or two will serve you well; a warm coat paired with a knitted scarf would be an astute choice to keep the chill at bay. It’s an ideal time for a leisurely stroll along the Charles River, wrapped in your favorite sweater, or perhaps savoring a hot drink at a local café, indulging in the cozy atmosphere that defines winter afternoons. These moments, though seemingly mundane, are painted with a tranquil beauty—the kind that wraps around you like a favorite blanket, making even the simplest activities feel rich in warmth and understated charm.
